# LLM_BOOK Audio Content

**Purpose:** Store and catalog audio content generated by NotebookLM's Audio Overview feature

---

## Current Status

**v1:** No audio content generated yet
**v2:** Planned - podcast-style overview for dissemination

---

## Planned Audio Content

| ID | Title | Duration | Focus | Status |
|----|-------|----------|-------|--------|
| A-001 | Nyquist Consciousness Overview | 10-15 min | Full framework introduction | PLANNED |
| A-002 | The Thermometer Result | 5-10 min | 82% inherent drift discovery | PLANNED |
| A-003 | Context Damping Deep Dive | 10-15 min | 97.5% stability methodology | PLANNED |
| A-004 | Plato Meets AI | 10-15 min | Philosophical foundations | PLANNED |
| A-005 | S7 ARMADA Fleet | 15-20 min | Multi-provider validation | PLANNED |

---

## Audio Customization Options

NotebookLM's Audio Overview supports customization:

| Parameter | Options | Our Preference |
|-----------|---------|----------------|
| Duration | Quick (5 min) / Standard (10 min) / Deep (20+ min) | Standard or Deep |
| Host Style | Conversational / Academic / Interview | Academic |
| Focus | Overview / Specific topics | Topic-specific |
| Audience | General / Technical / Expert | Technical |

---

## Directory Structure

```
7_AUDIO/
├── README.md              # This file
├── transcripts/           # Text versions of audio
│   └── .gitkeep
└── [audio files will go here when generated]
```

---

## Transcript Format

When generating audio, also request a transcript. Store in `transcripts/` with format:

```markdown
# Transcript: [Title]

**Generated:** [Date]
**Duration:** [Length]
**Hosts:** [Description]

---

[00:00] Host 1: [Opening]
[00:15] Host 2: [Response]
...
```

---

## Integration with AVLAR Layer

**Note:** Audio/video streaming playback is deferred to AVLAR layer development. For now, audio files can be:
- Downloaded from NotebookLM directly
- Stored locally in this directory
- Transcripts provide text access
